system.description:
The user auto-succeeds on a Grapple Maneuver check against the target if Jaw Lock hits. The Target becomes Bound 5. While the target is Bound, they cannot be switched out and cannot flee.

If either the Grappled or Bound condition ends, the target loses the other condition.

actions.name: Jaw Lock
actions.description:
The user auto-succeeds on a Grapple Maneuver check against the target if Jaw Lock hits. The Target becomes Bound 5. While the target is Bound, they cannot be switched out and cannot flee.

If either the Grappled or Bound condition ends, the target loses the other condition.
